channel.title: Projects on Rodrigo Müller
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Rodrigo Müller

item.title: Theme Documentation - Basics
item.description: Gokarna is an opinionated theme with a focus on minimalism and simplicity. Installation The following steps are here to help you initialize your new website. If you don’t know Hugo at all, we strongly suggest you learn more about it by following this great documentation for beginners. a. Create Your Project Hugo provides a new command to create a new website: hugo new site my_website cd my_website b. Install the Theme The theme’s repository is: https://github.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. The emojify function can be called directly in templates or Inline Shortcodes. To enable emoji globally, set enableEmoji to true in your site configuration and then you can type emoji shorthand codes directly in content files. These begin and end with a colon and include the code of an emoji: Gone camping! {?:}tent: Be back soon. That is so funny!

item.title: Blüdhaven
item.description: History Blüdhaven was a former whaling town, which was officially incorporated as a “Commonwealth” in 1912. The town had a generally poor socio-economic populace, owing in part to failed efforts to transform itself into a manufacturing and shipping center.

item.title: Hydra
item.description: Motto Cut off one head and two will take their place

item.description: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…. A project was planned, but never completed
